name: download-ncbi-data
description: download specific data from NCBI's FTP site

options.description: Download PubMed Central open-access archives in traditional format, unless already present.

Download the BioConcepts/PubTatorCentral mapping bioconcepts2pubtatorcentral.gz, unless already present.
